motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivationalQuotes.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam

motivationalQuotes.quote: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

motivationalQuotes.quote: Excellence is not a skill. It's an attitude.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Marston

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivationalQuotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
motivationalQuotes.author: John Dewey

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivationalQuotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
motivationalQuotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivationalQuotes.author: Sam Levenson

motivationalQuotes.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
motivationalQuotes.author: Helen Hayes

motivationalQuotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
motivationalQuotes.author: Mark Twain

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
motivationalQuotes.author: Robert Collier

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
motivationalQuotes.author: Anonymous

motivationalQuotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
motivationalQuotes.author: Nelson Mandela

motivationalQuotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
motivationalQuotes.author: Bo Bennett

motivationalQuotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
motivationalQuotes.author: Lao Tzu

motivationalQuotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
motivationalQuotes.author: Zig Ziglar

motivationalQuotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivationalQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
motivationalQuotes.author: Norman Vaughan

motivationalQuotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
motivationalQuotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
motivationalQuotes.author: Will Rogers

motivationalQuotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivationalQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis

motivationalQuotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
motivationalQuotes.author: Buddha

motivationalQuotes.quote: Every problem is an opportunity in disguise.
motivationalQuotes.author: John Adams

motivationalQuotes.quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph.
motivationalQuotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

motivationalQuotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your potential is endless. Go do what you were created to do.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Focus on progress, not perfection.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Martin

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is built on daily habits, not occasional greatness.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your attitude determines your direction.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivationalQuotes.quote: Small progress is still progress. Celebrate every step forward.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to try.
motivationalQuotes.author: Michael Jordan

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your goals don't care about your excuses.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Focus on the step in front of you, not the whole staircase.
motivationalQuotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

motivationalQuotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
motivationalQuotes.author: Zig Ziglar

motivationalQuotes.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Marston

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
motivationalQuotes.author: Winston Churchill

motivationalQuotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivationalQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: It's not about perfect. It's about effort.
motivationalQuotes.author: Jillian Michaels

motivationalQuotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
motivationalQuotes.author: Arthur Ashe

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your biggest competition is yourself.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is built on discipline, not motivation.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: The pain of discipline is better than the pain of regret.
motivationalQuotes.author: Jim Rohn

motivationalQuotes.quote: Every master was once a disaster.
motivationalQuotes.author: David Goggins

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your future self is watching you right now through memories.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only bad decision is indecision.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Champions aren't made in the gym. They are made by what they think.
motivationalQuotes.author: Muhammad Ali

motivationalQuotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
motivationalQuotes.author: Nelson Mandela

motivationalQuotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivationalQuotes.author: Walt Disney

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
motivationalQuotes.author: John Lennon

motivationalQuotes.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
motivationalQuotes.author: Mother Teresa

motivationalQuotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
motivationalQuotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
motivationalQuotes.author: Margaret Mead

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
motivationalQuotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

motivationalQuotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
motivationalQuotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

motivationalQuotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
motivationalQuotes.author: Helen Keller

motivationalQuotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
motivationalQuotes.author: Aristotle

motivationalQuotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
motivationalQuotes.author: Anne Frank

motivationalQuotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivationalQuotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
motivationalQuotes.author: Maya Angelou

motivationalQuotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
motivationalQuotes.author: Nelson Mandela

motivationalQuotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
motivationalQuotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivationalQuotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
motivationalQuotes.author: Babe Ruth

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
motivationalQuotes.author: Helen Keller

motivationalQuotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

motivationalQuotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
motivationalQuotes.author: Dr. Seuss

motivationalQuotes.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor.
motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

motivationalQuotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
motivationalQuotes.author: Dalai Lama

motivationalQuotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
motivationalQuotes.author: Mae West

motivationalQuotes.quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivationalQuotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
motivationalQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivationalQuotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
motivationalQuotes.author: Plato

motivationalQuotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
motivationalQuotes.author: Tony Robbins

motivationalQuotes.quote: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.
motivationalQuotes.author: Mother Teresa

motivationalQuotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

motivationalQuotes.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
motivationalQuotes.author: Robert Byrne

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
motivationalQuotes.author: Confucius

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivationalQuotes.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
motivationalQuotes.author: Bob Marley

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
motivationalQuotes.author: Charles Dickens

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
motivationalQuotes.author: James M. Barrie

motivationalQuotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
motivationalQuotes.author: Robert Frost

motivationalQuotes.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
motivationalQuotes.author: Bob Marley

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
motivationalQuotes.author: Helen Keller

motivationalQuotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
motivationalQuotes.author: Dr. Seuss

motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is trying things to see if they work.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ray Bradbury

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivationalQuotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
motivationalQuotes.author: Colin R. Davis

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
motivationalQuotes.author: Conrad Hilton

motivationalQuotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
motivationalQuotes.author: Colin Powell

motivationalQuotes.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
motivationalQuotes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

motivationalQuotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

motivationalQuotes.quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Barack Obama

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
motivationalQuotes.author: Zig Ziglar

motivationalQuotes.quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Estee Lauder

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Maya Angelou

motivationalQuotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
motivationalQuotes.author: David Brinkley

motivationalQuotes.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivationalQuotes.quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
motivationalQuotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

motivationalQuotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
motivationalQuotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

motivationalQuotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
motivationalQuotes.author: Chris Grosser

motivationalQuotes.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

motivationalQuotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivationalQuotes.quote: If you don't value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents--start charging for it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Kim Garst

motivationalQuotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
motivationalQuotes.author: Jim Rohn

motivationalQuotes.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
motivationalQuotes.author: Michael John Bobak
